targets.expr: (physicalDiskCapacityInMB{service="$service",instance="$idrac_ip"}) + on (physicalDiskNumber) group_left(physicalDiskDisplayName) (physicalDiskDisplayName{service="$service",instance="$idrac_ip"}) + on (physicalDiskNumber) group_left(physicalDiskProductID) (physicalDiskProductID{service="$service",instance="$idrac_ip"})  + on (physicalDiskNumber) group_left(physicalDiskSerialNo) (physicalDiskSerialNo{service="$service",instance="$idrac_ip"})
